statements: SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor_id = '987e6543-21b3-4d67-8a56-974124614426';
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_id, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '2023-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2023-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND schedule_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT course_id, instructor_id, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_name LIKE '%Java%' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_id, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_time <= '2023-03-15' ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule_date, instructor_id FROM course_schedule;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, available_days, available_hours FROM instructor_availability;
SELECT course_name, schedule_date, instructor_id, course_id FROM course_schedule;
SELECT instructor_name, available_days, available_hours, instructor_id FROM instructor_availability;
SELECT schedule_date, course_name, course_id, instructor_id FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule_date FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, available_days FROM instructor_availability WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, available_hours FROM course_schedule INNER JOIN instructor_availability ON course_schedule.instructor_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name, schedule_date FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_id IN (SELECT instructor_id FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_days LIKE '%Mon%');
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, availability_start, availability_end FROM InstructorAvailability ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE start_time >= '09:00:00';

SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule JOIN CourseInstructor ON CourseSchedule.course_id = CourseInstructor.course_id JOIN InstructorAvailability ON CourseInstructor.instructor_id = InstructorAvailability.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT instructor_name, availability_start, availability_end FROM InstructorAvailability

SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule INNER JOIN CourseInstructor ON CourseSchedule.course_id = CourseInstructor.course_id INNER JOIN InstructorAvailability ON CourseInstructor.instructor_id = InstructorAvailability.instructor_id
SELECT * FROM CourseInstructor WHERE instructor_id = 1

SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time, availability_start, availability_end FROM CourseSchedule INNER JOIN CourseInstructor ON CourseSchedule.course_id = CourseInstructor.course_id INNER JOIN InstructorAvailability ON CourseInstructor.instructor_id = InstructorAvailability.instructor_id
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, email FROM Instructor ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseInstructor WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM CourseRoom WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY room_name;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';

SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule JOIN CourseInstructor ON CourseSchedule.course_id = CourseInstructor.course_id JOIN Instructor ON CourseInstructor.instructor_id = Instructor.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name, room_name, capacity FROM CourseSchedule JOIN CourseRoom ON CourseSchedule.course_id = CourseRoom.room_id;
SELECT * FROM Instructor WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Course WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_name, course_credit, course_description FROM Course ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_credit, schedule_date FROM Course JOIN Schedule ON Course.course_id = Schedule.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Course ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT Course.course_name, Instructor.instructor_name FROM Course JOIN Schedule ON Course.course_id = Schedule.course_id JOIN Instructor ON Schedule.instructor_id = Instructor.instructor_id;

SELECT room_name, room_capacity, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM Room JOIN CourseRoom ON Room.room_id = CourseRoom.room_id JOIN Schedule ON CourseRoom.schedule_id = Schedule.schedule_id WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
